column5: What,  too old to do the "Berton"??
Happy Birthday Canada
I second that!
The older I get, and the more I travel, my appreciation to live in Canada increases.
3rd and 4th that from myself & Captain Canuck!
Happy Birthday to my neighbors to the north!  Enjoy the day
No where else I'd rather be.  Always easy to find the flaws, but we are so lucky here in so many ways.
She agrees.  Canada Day 3 years ago:     London Ballon festival from 8-9 years ago:
No place I'd rather be ! Thank you to our troops and fallen soldiers .  Happy Canada Day !!!!!
Happy Canada Day to our wonderful neighbors to the North!
I have this urge to eat poutine, while in a canoe. Must be July !st!
My parents landed her 55 years ago and never left. One good place to be.
Woohooo!!!!   No better place to live!  Lew, I am going to hit you up for some Kawartha muskie action in a PM soon
Congrats Canada, .........no place I'd rather be and I'm not even Canadian
Great thread Lew, Thanks for starting it. Many thanks also to the brave people in uniform, past and present, who defend our great Country.
I have this urge to eat poutine, while in a canoe. Must be July !st!  What,  too old to do the "Berton"??

I not so much proud  to be a Canadian as I am glad and grateful to be one. We have sometimes canoe camped where there's nobody to be seen or heard---maybe 2-4 people a few kms down the ;lake and I think to myself(or say out loud) "What a country. How lucky we are"
Yup
Here here!  Happy Canada Day!!
Cheers Canada
Oooooooo caaaaaannnnaaaaaadddddaaaaa! Man i love this country! And i got the ink to prove it!! Time to go out for a boat ride and then blow stuff up!! Whhheeeewwww!
Best country in the world, thx to all the vets past and present
Right on Lew.  Have a great day all.

Ill be spending my day fishing and swimming with the kiddos! Bonfire tonight and fireworks! And the wife can join seeing its a holiday!  Happy Canada Day OFC! I truly hope you all enjoy the day, whatever your plans are!
Happy birthday Canada, it is a great place with great people.
